Name: Crusade of Deitra
About the game: Evil rules over the lands of Deitra, a mysterious child was born inside the Chaos. Discover the mysterious story of the child of Deitra, rebuild pieces of the past, defeat enemies and tenable Bosses along your way, face dungeons, solve puzzles, explore the immense world of Deitra. ◊ Two Different Endings ◊ Two Choices (male Or Female) ◊ Several Classes With Unique Skills to Try ◊ Different Pets Fighting By Your Side ◊ A World Full Of Mystery and Danger ◊ Several Bosses to Defeat ◊ More Than 150 Items to Craft ◊ More Than 150 Enemies to Fight ◊ More Than 100 Achivements ◊ Cultivation ◊ A Lot Of Side Quests to Complete ◊ Secret Skills and Items to discover and much more to discover
